message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, you take 10. This way we can both get something and avoid endless rounds.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair.  Let's be reasonable and avoid going back and forth.
I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 is too much in your favor. Let's split it 80/20 this time. We're both losing value with each round, so let's be practical.
